bike.description: Reynolds 853 air-hardened/heat-treated chromoly main tubes, reinforced head tube collars, gusseted down tube, double-butted cromo stays, Jamis lost wax dropouts

components.description: Rock Shox Reba RL, lever actuated lockout, Solo Air spring pressure adjust, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit MX, Alloy cups, ACB bearings
American Classic Tubeless 29 Disc with AC130 front & AC 225 rear hubs, AC butted spokes & alloy nipples
Geax Saguaro 29 x 2.2" front & 2.0" rear, folding
SRAM X9 mid cage rear and X9 28.6mm dual pull front
Ritchey Pro 2x bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x +/- 5mm rise x 720mm
Ritchey Pro 2 bolt OS, 27.2 x 400mm, with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
Avid Elixir 3 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear HS1 rotors
